title: New: Dominique Young Unique- Rambo
body:
It must be hard to be a female MC right about now.

Hip-Hop, after all, is a male dominated genre. And for some reason the music buying public only has a small tolerance for female artists at any one given time. **[Dominique Young Unique](http://soundcloud.com/dominiqueyoungunique)** has been building up buzz for a small time now, and there’s no reason she can’t get cosy with the likes of **Banks** and **Minaj** sooner rather than later.

Her new cut, _Ranbo_, is a pumping and bass fuelled little gem. It features a Ravenously quick flow delivered with an understated voice that perhaps puts her in a different lane to her recent contemporaries.

Here’s hoping.

And for some reason the music buying public only has a small tolerance for female artists at any one given time. Dominique Young Unique has been building up buzz for a small time now, and \[…\]
